items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 315 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 64!

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what‚Äôs on tap! That's 35 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 8!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 200 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 41!
One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 70 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 15!

It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it‚Äôs time to drink it! That's 450 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 91!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what‚Äôs on tap! That's 140 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 29!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 265 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 54! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least a beer from 35 different countries. Try 5 more for Level 8!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren‚Äôt you?. That‚Äôs 165 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 34!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 430 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 150 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 31!
After a long day, what better way to kick back than with a crisp and refreshing lager? You're already feeling more relaxed, aren‚Äôt you?. That‚Äôs 210 different Lagers! Try 5 more for Level 43!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 335 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

Did you know that Latvia's landscape is marked with large beaches and dense forest? Neither did we, because we are here for the beer! That's 5 different beers from a brewery from Latvia. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 30 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 7!
